titles.title: Expressing support for designation of the month of September 2009 as "National Atrial Fibrillation Awareness Month" and supporting efforts to educate the public about atrial fibrillation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 9/15/2008--Introduced. Expresses support for the designation of National Atrial Fibrillation Awareness Month.Recognizes the need for additional research into treatment for atrial fibrillation.
